headline: Compared to Estimates, Autodesk (ADSK) Q3 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Autodesk (ADSK) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended October 2024, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Autodesk (ADSK) Tops Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Autodesk (ADSK) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 2.84% and 0.48%, respectively, for the quarter ended October 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Autodesk Stock Drops Sharply Despite Earnings Beat
summary: The company said in April it was investigating its own practices in connection with free cash flow and adjusted operating margins.

headline: Autodesk shares tumble despite a beat-and-raise report
summary: Autodesk (NASDAQ:ADSK) shares fell 6.5% after the software company reported third-quarter earnings that narrowly beat expectations.

raw.headline: Autodesk shares tumble despite a beat-and-raise report
raw.summary: Autodesk (NASDAQ:ADSK) shares fell 6.5% after the software company reported third-quarter earnings that narrowly beat expectations.

headline: Autodesk: Fiscal Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The San Francisco-based company said it had net income of $1.27 per share. Earnings, adjusted for stock option expense and amortization costs, were $2.17 per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Autodesk: Fiscal Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The San Francisco-based company said it had net income of $1.27 per share. Earnings, adjusted for stock option expense and amortization costs, were $2.17 per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

headline: Autodesk (NASDAQ:ADSK) Reports Q3 In Line With Expectations, Quarterly Revenue Guidance Slightly Exceeds Expectations
summary: Design software company Autodesk (NASDAQ:ADSK) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2024, with sales up 11% year on year to $1.57 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $1.63 billion, coming in 0.6% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.17 per share was 2.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Autodesk (NASDAQ:ADSK) Reports Q3 In Line With Expectations, Quarterly Revenue Guidance Slightly Exceeds Expectations

headline: Autodesk beats third-quarter revenue estimates, announces new CFO
summary: Michael Ashley Schulman, chief investment officer at Running Point Capital, said that a strong upward trend in the company's shares after its first and second quarter results boosted expectations for the firm.  "There may also be some apprehension of a slowdown in a couple of Autodesk's primary industries of construction and architecture if Trump expels illegal migrants," he added.  Autodesk also announced the appointment of Janesh Moorjani as its new finance chief, effective Dec. 16.

Autodesk also announced the appointment of Janesh Moorjani as its new finance chief, effective Dec. 16.

headline: Autodesk appoints Janesh Moorjani as chief financial officer
summary: Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADSK) today announced the appointment of Janesh Moorjani as the company's chief financial officer, effective December 16, 2024. Moorjani brings over 20 years of experience in the technology industry, with deep expertise in driving growth and efficiency at scale. Most recently, Moorjani served as CFO and COO of Elastic NV (NYSE: ESTC), the Search AI Company.
